src:
They said what?! Pros react to Darren Till’s dull win over Kelvin Gastelum at UFC 244
03 Nov 2019, 04:18 by Lucas Rezende



It did not end in a finish, but Darren Till fought intelligently and avoided a third straight loss, outpointing Kelvin Gastelum en route to a split decision win at UFC 244. On Twitter, pro fighters reacted to the bout and the decision.






















































Watch ‘UFC 244 - ‘MASVIDAL VS DIAZ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! GET THE FIGHTS!
